entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -25.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 08:46 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -25.8°C
Pressure: 104.1 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
